data.title: Disarmament Demobilization and Reintegration of Ex-Combatants
data.meta_description: Listen to this episode from Irregular Warfare Podcast on Spotify. In today's episode, we delve into the topic of disarmament, demobilization, and reintegration (DDR) of ex-combatants. Our guests explore the theoretical underpinnings of DDR, the motivations behind individuals joining armed groups, and effective strategies for reintegrating former combatants back into society.
